short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplifies the management of your business partners' Ecocert certification data

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Businesses  that are certified to certain standards like "EU Organic" have to maintain an up-to-date list of certified business partners. Most certificates are made available online by control bodies such as Ecocert. However, looking up every business partner on a regular basis can be very time-consuming task.

This free extension helps you maintain your list of Ecocert-certified business partners / operators, directly on the Ecocert website at http://certificat.ecocert.com.

➤ Save your organic food operators in a 'favorites' list,
➤ Get all your favorite operators' data displayed on the Ecocert Certificates main page (certificat.ecocert.com) -- see screenshots,
➤ Update all your records periodically with a single click (sync limited to once an hour for each operator). 
➤ Download your operators' data as '.csv' file to import into MS Excel / Google Sheets for further treatment. 
➤ Data is saved locally in your Chrome browser, not shared with anyone.


Note: This extension is independent from Ecocert Group.

_____________________________________________________
Known bugs - To be fixed in future releases:

1. Where operators have more than one type of certification in place, for example "EU Bio" and "Gluten-free", the extension will only consider the first certification type appearing on the Ecocert page.
2. A few operators have an Ecocert page, but no certificates available. Such operators can be added to your favorites list, but will be missing from the ".csv" downloads.
